item.description:
So, the Bell in Hand has started a new trivia night on Wednesdays.  :D WHOOO HOO!! Here is a recent description sent to us from the Boston Event Guide folks:

"We are starting a weekly trivia night on Wednesdays at Bell in Hand. The winning team or individual gets their bar tab taken care of up to $50 and a gift certificate to Bell in Hand. We are working on building the night up and creating a grand prize contest. The event is free with chips & salsa, low cost drinks and low cost food."


A lover of all things trivia related, I figure I'll give it a whirl this next Wednesday, October 5th.  Trivia starts @ 8pm but I'll be there sooner than that to get myself situated.  I'll try to save seats/spots but NO GUARANTEE!! If you show up at 7:59pm don't complain that there's nowhere to sit, no tables, etc. I'm not putting an attendee limit on this as we'll just break up into teams if needed. 

The Bell in Hand offers great menu items, and as seen above, free chips and salsa! I'll post more deets as the date nears.  I hope you can make it!

NOTE: Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink.  MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER!

This event is cross-listed with Social Fun. 

UPDATE 10/5/2011 4:45pm:  Trivia will be held on the side of the bar/restaurant with the STAGE so please look for me there.  I look like my pic so you should be able to find me.   Thanks! Hope to see you soon!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try to post what I'm wearing that day so people can find our group
item.name: Trivia Nite at the Bell in Hand
